arts.ttl: Italiano understanding of Genoa rage after Bologna penalty
arts.sum: Vincenzo Italiano defends the decision to assign a last-gasp penalty to Bologna against Genoa, but...

arts.ttl: Serie A | Bologna 2-1 Genoa: Castro magic and last-gasp Orsolini decisive
arts.sum: A moment of Santiago Castro magic and contentious Riccardo Orsolini penalty at the 99th minute...

In the 2024/25 Serie A season, Riccardo Orsolini scored against Genoa in both the first leg at Marassi (a 2-2 draw) and the return leg in Bologna (a 1-3 victory for the Ligurian side). Lorenzo Venturino, a Genoa forward born in 2006, scored a brace in Bologna on the final day of the 2024/25 Serie A season.
